article_title: What New York City's Fast Food Minimum Wage Increase Means For Workers
article_text: You need to LOG IN to edit your watchlist.

article_metadata.description: New York City fast food workers are getting a pay raise after the state's wage board approved a new minimum hourly pay of $15, up from $8.75.
article_metadata.author: Brittany Umar
